document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Thro' </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">lane </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">lay </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thro' </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">bramble </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Thro' </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">clearing, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thro' </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">wood </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">Banditti </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">often </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">passed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">lonely </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">road </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">wolf </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">came </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">peering </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">curious </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">Owl </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">looked </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">puzzled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">down </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">Serpent's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">satin </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">figure </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">Glid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">stealthily </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">along </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">tempests </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">touched </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">garments </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">Lightning's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">poinards </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">gleamed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">Fierce </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">crag </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">above </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">hungry </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">vulture </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">screamed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">satyr's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">fingers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">beckoned </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">Valley </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">murmured </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"Come" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">These </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">mates </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">This </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">road </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">These </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">Children </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">fluttered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">home. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Through lane it lay - thro' bramble
